faqs.question: Могут ли иностранцы купить недвижимость в Испании?
faqs.answer: Yes, non-Spanish citizens purchase property in Spain without restrictions or special permits. British, American, Australian, and other international buyers acquire residential properties following standard conveyancing processes. Your solicitor navigates legality, taxation, and documentation. Most buyers require Spanish bank accounts and tax numbers (NIE), which are straightforward to obtain. Property ownership follows identical legal protections regardless of nationality.

faqs.question: Каковы расходы на покупку недвижимости в Испании?
faqs.answer: Acquisition costs total approximately 10-13% of purchase price. This includes: property transfer tax (6-10%, varies by region), notary fees (0.5%), registry fees (0.1%), and legal/administration costs (1-2%). In Alicante, transfer tax runs 10% for most buyers. Additional costs: surveyor (€300-500), builder's warranty verification, and mortgage arrangement (if applicable). Our team provides detailed cost breakdowns ensuring transparent budgeting.

The region balances modern amenities with cultural authenticity, making it ideal for relocation and investment.

faqs.question: Какова стоимость жизни на Коста-Бланке?
faqs.answer: Cost of living runs 30-40% below UK equivalents. Groceries average €150-200 monthly per person. Utilities (electricity, water, gas) cost €80-120 monthly. Restaurant meals: €10-15 for casual dining, €25-40 for quality establishments. School fees for international education: €3,000-6,000 annually. Healthcare through private insurance: €80-150 monthly. This affordability compounds your property investment advantages, making relocation financially sensible.

faqs.question: Как далеко Коста-Бланка от России?
faqs.answer: Alicante Airport operates 50 kilometers from Hondón de las Nieves (50-minute drive). Direct flights to London, Manchester, Birmingham, and regional UK airports operate multiple daily departures. Flight times average 2.5 hours. Budget airlines (Ryanair, EasyJet) maintain competitive pricing. Flights typically cost €40-120 return depending on season. This accessibility allows easy UK visits while establishing Spanish residency.

faqs.question: Какая погода на Коста-Бланке?
faqs.answer: Costa Blanca enjoys Mediterranean climate: sunny year-round with average 300+ annual sunshine days. Winters are mild (10-15°C daytime) with occasional rain. Summers are warm (28-32°C) with sea breezes providing natural cooling. Spring and autumn offer perfect temperatures (18-24°C). The elevation of Hondón de las Nieves provides cooler summers than coastal areas. This climate supports outdoor family activities, gardening, and comfortable year-round living without extreme weather concerns.

faqs.question: Нужна ли мне виза для покупки недвижимости в Испании?
faqs.answer: Property purchase doesn't require visa status — non-residents can legally purchase. However, if planning residency, various visa options exist: Golden Visa (€500,000+ investment), Digital Nomad Visa (work remotely), Student Visa, or Family Reunification. EU/UK citizens navigate post-Brexit requirements; British citizens typically obtain long-term residency through property ownership combined with financial proof. Our legal team advises visa pathways matching your circumstances.

faqs.question: Могу ли я получить ипотеку в Испании как иностранец?
faqs.answer: Yes, foreign buyers obtain Spanish mortgages through Spanish banks. Most lenders require: proof of income, employment history, bank statements, tax returns, and property valuation. Typical loan-to-value ratios range 60-80%. Interest rates for foreign buyers average 3.5-4.5% (competitive with UK rates). Required documentation is straightforward; your solicitor coordinates bank interactions. Alternative: some buyers finance through home equity lines or international mortgages.
